resources.string:
cccTV is an Open Source project developed by Stefan Medack. All sources are available under the Apache License 2.0 on https://github.com/stefanmedack/cccTV. 

The video material is kindly provided by media.ccc.de 

Special thanks to Chaos Computer Club e.V. (CCC) for hosting the content and everybody involved in its production, as well as to everybody participating in the videos and sharing their knowledge. 

If you like this App, rate it on Google Play (scan the QR-Code or visit https://goo.gl/Dradno). In case you are missing some features or found a Bug, let me know. To improve the content of the Videos, contact or join the Chaos Computer Club e.V. 

For the list of Open Source Libraries and Licenses, please have a look below.
This little fella is designed by Sebastian Morr and distributed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 License (https://morr.cc/voctocat/)
Uups, this feature is still missing - check back later
